Text: Actually PB must have renewed the system or something because all the previous (existing) comments dissapeared ;) So no need call them ungrateful, there was response. :)) Always ready to contribute such great stuff to the masses ;)
looks like the whole swarm is stuck around 95%. Could anybody out there seed?

Very good movie thanks to an incredible performance by a very young Sarah Polley (she even sings on much of the pretty soundtrack) and Bruce Greenwood.
Bertrand Russel's book which it's based on is great and a must read though.
